name: video-chat-signaling-server
description: WebRTC signaling server for video chat application

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for JavaScript'
scripts.generate-certs: openssl genrsa -out private-key.pem 2048 && openssl req -new -x509 -key private-key.pem -out certificate.pem -days 365 -subj "/CN=localhost"
scripts.generate-certs:win: openssl genrsa -out private-key.pem 2048 && openssl req -new -x509 -key private-key.pem -out certificate.pem -days 365 -subj "/CN=localhost"

author: Your Name
